   Government is Not God PAC
   stated on September 23, 2012 in a newspaper advertisement:
   "Barack Hussein Obama will ... force Christian schools to hire
   non-Christian teachers."

true false
     * National
     * Legal Issues

     * Government is Not God PAC
   Louis Jacobson
   By Louis Jacobson September 26, 2012
   Katie Sanders
   By Katie Sanders September 26, 2012

Newspaper ad says Barack Obama will “force Christian schools to hire
non-Christian teachers”

   An ad placed by the socially conservative group Government Is Not God in
   the Sarasota, Fla., Herald-Tribune and other newspapers in Florida and
   Ohio claims President Barack Obama will "force Christian schools to hire
   non-Christian teachers."

And so the Government Is Not God PAC is relying on the government's
   arguments as evidence for the ad’s claim that Obama will "force Christian
   schools to hire non-Christian teachers."

Featured Fact-check

   Facebook posts
   stated on February 26, 2021 in an image
   Says Jerry Nadler said “God has no authority in the House of
   Representatives”
   true false
   By Daniel Funke • February 26, 2021

   Our ruling

   The ad claims that Obama will "force Christian schools to hire
   non-Christian teachers."
